title: Write unit tests for new schema fields
description:
Add comprehensive unit tests for the new workflow fields in internal/tick/tick_test.go

Test categories:
1. Validation tests for requires/awaiting/verdict
2. Serialization tests (JSON round-trip)
3. Helper method tests (IsAwaitingHuman, GetAwaitingType, etc.)

Use table-driven tests following existing patterns.
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Validation tests cover all valid/invalid values for requires
- [ ] Validation tests cover all valid/invalid values for awaiting
- [ ] Validation tests cover all valid/invalid values for verdict
- [ ] Serialization tests verify JSON round-trip
- [ ] Helper method tests cover all cases including backwards compat
- [ ] All tests pass
closed_reason: Added TestWorkflowFieldsJSONSerialization with 8 subtests: all_workflow_fields_set, workflow_fields_nil_omitted, requires_values_roundtrip (all 3 values), awaiting_values_roundtrip (all 7 values), verdict_values_roundtrip (both values), unmarshal_from_json_string, unmarshal_without_workflow_fields (backwards compat), workflow_fields_with_manual_flag (legacy compat). Tests verify JSON marshal/unmarshal round-trips, omitempty behavior, and parsing from raw JSON strings.
